question.body: Which of the following does not shorten during sarcomere contraction?

multiple_choice.choice: The distance between the Z discs

response.feedback: Correct. The A band remains constant.
Incorrect. The H band which has only thick filaments is reduced in size.
Incorrect. The I band with only thin filaments is reduced in size.
Incorrect. The distance between the Z discs decreases during contraction.
